name: Tight Rooms (LD42 - COMPO)
description:
Escape the rooms before the walls crush you!

Pick coins (or yellow peas?) to score, and greenies to increase your speed!

Made within 48h with Unity. 

Play on Kongregate! Please, also leave a 5 stars rating if you like the game, it does help a lot :)

Windows version may be removed after Ludum Dare 42 is over!
